about_the_game:
Get ready for an exciting adventure as you search for adorable ducks in a stunning city! Discover all the hidden ducks in this vibrant game and help restore tranquility to the city.

Happy Duck Hunting!
detailed_description:
Get ready for an exciting adventure as you search for adorable ducks in a stunning city! Discover all the hidden ducks in this vibrant game and help restore tranquility to the city.

Happy Duck Hunting!

fullgame.name: My Hidden Pets: Find My Duck

name: My Hidden Pets: Find My Duck Demo
short_description: A short demo showing off the game's gameplay. Find all the ducks in a sunny summer location!
supported_languages:
